title: [Large-Scale] Competency Enhancement Through Workplace Fun and Informal Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Core job-related knowledge and 3+ years of practical experience
context.additional_context: Program supporting current practitioners in combining fun and informal learning within daily tasks to foster creativity, including managerial support and learning motivation strategies

learning_goals: Participants can derive at least three informal learning opportunities using fun elements in the workplace.
Participants can design team-based creative problem-solving strategies by linking learning motivation and management support.
Participants can build informal learning networks using digital collaboration tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
